hero.description: Passionate Software Developer dedicated to creating solutions.
about.title: About Me
about.description:
Hello! I am Federico Moretto, a passionate and professional developer with experience in software development and technical support.

Currently, I work at Asince SRL as Technical Support, where my main responsibilities include:


  • -Reading, analyzing, and resolving error tickets.
  • -Implementing hotfixes to ensure system stability.
  • -Developing new features and application improvements.
  • -Monitoring and managing the status of servers and databases.

I have technical skills in C#.NET, Vue.js, TypeScript, Oracle PL/SQL, and Azure, which I also apply in personal projects during my free time, exploring innovative and practical solutions for real-world challenges.


In addition, I have solid experience in foreign trade, with more than 3 years in the field, and a bachelorâ€™s degree that complements my methodical and structured approach to software development.


I am passionate about teamwork, solving complex problems, and contributing to the development of robust and high-impact systems. I constantly seek to learn and grow in the technological field, including areas such as artificial intelligence and emerging technologies.


I am open to connecting with other professionals, sharing knowledge, and exploring new opportunities that allow me to continue developing both personally and professionally.
